name: Shourya

name: The Boss's Daughter

name: Still
summary_text: Tom (Game of Thrones' Aiden Gillen) gets into a feud with a teenage gang after a seemingly harmless encounter with a neighborhood kid. As his personal life also starts to unravel, the feud escalates to a shattering climax.

name: Andre the Butcher
summary_text: Andre the Butcher will make sure you pay for your sins.
